title: Unable to post in other boards?
body:
Currently I cannot post in other boards because of the level restriction. I haven't posted on the boards in a while so I'm not sure what to do.

Edit: Now that I look at it, it seems a cannot do anything at all other than post into this section.
(Comments as well.)

replies.body:
Often times if you haven't posted on the boards, your summoner and boards profile will have fallen out of sync. Posts like this here in Help & Support usually resolve this by forcing a sync again. This seems to be what happened, so you should be clear to post elsewhere on the boards now.

Happy posting!
